thread.title: Umpires for Wild Card games, division series announced
thread.title_full: Umpires for Wild Card games, division series announced - KCTV5

author: Posted by Chris Oberholtz, Multimedia Producer
title: Umpires for Wild Card games, division series announced
text:
KANSAS CITY, MO (KCTV) - Major League Baseball has announced the umpires who have been assigned to 2015 postseason games through the division series.
The Wild Card Game crew chiefs will be Ted Barrett and John Hirschbeck, while the division series crew chiefs will be Gary Cederstrom, Gerry Davis, Dana DeMuth and Dale Scott.
Barrett will lead the crew Tuesday in the American League Wild Card Game between the Houston Astros and the New York Yankees with 17-year major league umpire Eric Cooper slated to call balls and strikes.
They will be joined by Chris Conroy, Paul Emmel, Manny Gonzalez and regular season crew chief Bill Miller. 
Hirschbeck’s crew has been assigned to Wednesday's National League Wild Card Game between the Chicago Cubs and the Pittsburgh Pirates. 
His crew will include home plate umpire Jeff Nelson, a regular season crew chief and 18-year major league umpire, along with Cory Blaser, Mike Estabrook, Jim Reynolds and Hunter Wendelstedt.
The American League Division Series are scheduled to begin Thursday.
The crew chiefs on the AL side will be Gerry Davis (AL WC @ KC) and Dale Scott (TEX @ TOR). 
Scott’s crew will include Dan Bellino, Vic Caparazza, James Hoye, Marvin Hudson and Alfonso Marquez. 
The crew led by Davis features Lance Barksdale, Mike Everitt, Angel Hernandez, Ron Kulpa and Todd Tichenor. 
The National League Division Series are set to start Friday. 
The chew chiefs for the NLDS will be Gary Cederstrom (NYM @ LAD) and Dana DeMuth (NL WC @ STL). 
Cederstrom will work with Chad Fairchild, Greg Gibson, Chris Guccione, Alan Porter and Jim Wolf. 
DeMuth, who worked his 4,000th career major league game this season, will be alongside Mark Carlson, Phil Cuzzi, Brian Knight, Bill Welke and regular season crew chief Mike Winters.
Dan Iassogna and Mark Wegner will be the replay officials for the Wild Card games, while Kerwin Danley, Paul Nauert, Brian O’Nora and regular season crew chief Tim Welke will fill those roles during the division series.
